GR13saulahau:0: ANALYTIC VERSION according to BHELA conventions:
GR13saulahau:7: PADA MARKERS For a four-pada verse:
GR13saulahau:9: śivaḥ śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ $ na ced evaṃ devo na khalu kuśalaḥ spanditum api &
GR13saulahau:10: atas tvām ārādhyāṃ hariharavirañcyādibhir api % praṇantuṃ stotuṃ vā katham akṛtapuṇyaḥ prabhavati tanīyāṃsaṃ pāṃsuṃ tava caraṇapaṅkeruhabhavaṃ $ virañciḥ saṃcinvan viracayati lokān avikalam
GR13saulahau:11: vahaty enaṃ śauriḥ katham api sahasreṇa śirasāṃ % haraḥ saṃkṣubhyainaṃ bhajati bhasitoddhūlanavidhim avidyānām antastimiramihiradvīpanagarī $ jaḍānāṃ caitanyastabakamakarandasrutijharī &
GR13saulahau:12: daridrāṇāṃ cintāmaṇiguṇanikā janmajaladhau % nimagnānāṃ daṃṣṭrā muraripuvarāhasya bhavatī tvadanyaḥ pāṇibhyām abhayavarado daivatagaṇas $ tvam ekā naivāsi
GR13saulahau:14: bhayāt trātuṃ dātuṃ phalam api ca vāñchāsamadhikaṃ % śaraṇye lokānāṃ tava
GR13saulahau:16: haris tvām ārādhya praṇatajanasaubhāgyajananīṃ $ purā nārī bhūtvā
GR13saulahau:18: smaro 'pi tvāṃ natvā ratinayanalehyena vapuṣā % munīnām apy antaḥ
GR13saulahau:20: dhanuḥ pauṣpaṃ maurvī madhukaramayī pañca viśikhā $ vasantaḥ sāmanto malayamarudāyodhanarathaḥ
GR13saulahau:21: tathāpy ekaḥ sarvaṃ himagirisute kām api kṛpāṃ % apāṅgāt te labdhvā jagad idam anaṅgo vijayate kvaṇatkāñcīdāmā karikalabhakumbhastanabharā $ parikṣīṇā madhye pariṇataśaraccandravadanā
GR13saulahau:22: dhanur bāṇān pāśaṃ sṛṇim api dadhānā karatalaiḥ % purastād āstāṃ naḥ
GR13saulahau:24: sudhāsindhor madhye suraviṭapivāṭīparivṛte $ maṇidvīpe nīpopavanavati cintāmaṇigṛhe &
GR13saulahau:25: śivākāre mañce paramaśivaparyaṅkanilayāṃ % bhajanti tvāṃ dhanyāḥ kati cana cidānandalaharīm mahīṃ mūlādhāre kam api maṇipūre hutavahaṃ $ sthitaṃ svādhiṣṭhāne hṛdi
GR13saulahau:27: mano 'pi bhrūmadhye sakalam api bhittvā kulapathaṃ % sahasrāre padme saha
GR13saulahau:29: sudhādhārāsāraiś caraṇayugalāntarvigalitaiḥ $ prapañcaṃ siñcantī punar api rasaāmnāyamahasā
GR13saulahau:30: avāpya svāṃ bhūmiṃ bhujaganibham adhyuṣṭavalayaṃ % svam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā
GR13saulahau:32: caturbhiḥ śrīkaṇṭhaiḥ śivayuvatibhiḥ pañcabhir api $ prabhinnābhiḥ śaṃbhor navabhir iti mūlaprakṛtibhiḥ &
GR13saulahau:33: trayaś catvāriṃśad vasudalakalāśratrivalaya- % trirekhābhiḥ sārdhaṃ tava
GR13saulahau:35: tvadīyaṃ saundaryaṃ tuhina-giri-kanye tulayituṃ $ kavī1ndrāḥ kalpante katham api viriñci-prabhṛtayaḥ
GR13saulahau:36: yad ālokyautsukyād amaralalanā yānti manasā % tapobhir duṣ-prāpām api giriśasāyujyapadavīm naraṃ varṣīyāṃsaṃ nayana-vi-rasaṃ narmasu jaḍaṃ $ tavāpāṅgā3loke patitam anudhāvanti śataśaḥ
GR13saulahau:39: kṣitau ṣat-pañcāśad dvi-sam-adhika-pañcāśad udake $ hutā3śe dvā-ṣaṣṭiś
GR13saulahau:41: divi dviḥ-ṣat-triṃśan manasi ca catuḥ-ṣaṣṭir iti ye % mayūkhās teṣām apy
GR13saulahau:45: sakṛn na tvā natvā katham iva stāṃ saṃnidadhate %
GR13saulahau:47: kavī1ndrāṇāṃ cetaḥ-kamala-vana-bālā3tapa-ruciṃ $ bhajante ye santaḥ kati cid aruṇām eva bhavatīm
GR13saulahau:48: virañci-preyasyās taruṇatara-śṛṅgāra-laharī- % -gabhīrābhir vāgbhir vidadhati satāṃ rañjanam amī // Saul_16 //
GR13saulahau:49: savitrībhir vācāṃ śaśi-maṇi-śilā-bhaṅga-rucibhir $ vaśiny-ādyābhis tvāṃ saha janani saṃcintayati yaḥ &
GR13saulahau:50: sa kartā kāvyānāṃ bhavati mahatāṃ bhaṅgi-su-bhagair % vacobhir
GR13saulahau:51: tanu-cchāyābhis te taruṇa-taraṇi-śrī-saraṇibhir $ divaṃ sarvām urvīm
GR13saulahau:55: mukhaṃ binduṃ kṛtvā kuca-yugam adhas tasya tad-adho $ ha-rārdhaṃ dhyāyed yo hara-mahiṣi te manmatha-kalām &
GR13saulahau:56: sa sadyaḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ nayati vanitā ity ati-laghu % tri-lokīm apy āśu bhramayati ravī1ndu-stana-yugām kirantīm aṅgebhyaḥ kiraṇa-nikurambā-mṛta-rasaṃ $ hṛdi tvām ādhatte
GR13saulahau:58: sa sarpāṇāṃ darpaṃ śamayati śakuntādhipa iva % jvara-pluṣṭān dṛṣṭyā sukhayati sudhā-dhāra-sirayā taḍil-lekhā-tanvīṃ tapana-śaśi-vaiśvānaramayīṃ $ niṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇām apy upari kamalānāṃ tava kalām &
GR13saulahau:59: mahā-padmāṭavyāṃ mṛdita-mala-māyena manasā % mahāntaḥ paśyanto dadhati
GR13saulahau:60: bhavāni tvaṃ dāse mayi vitara dṛṣṭiṃ sa-karuṇāṃ $ iti stotuṃ vāñchan
GR13saulahau:63: tvayā hṛtvā vāmaṃ vapur a-paritṛptena manasā $ śarīrārdhaṃ śaṃbhor aparam
GR13saulahau:65: tathā hi tvad-rūpaṃ sa-kalam aruṇā3bhaṃ tri-nayanaṃ % kucābhyām ānamraṃ kuṭila-śaśi-cūḍāla-mukuṭam jagat sūte dhātā harir avati rudraḥ kṣapayate $ tiras kurvann etat svam api vapur īśas tirayati
GR13saulahau:66: sadā-pūrvaḥ sarvaṃ tad idam anugṛhṇāti ca śivas % tavā8jñām ālambya
GR13saulahau:68: trayāṇāṃ devānāṃ tri-guṇa-janitānāṃ tava śive $ bhavet pūjā pūjā tava caraṇayor yā viracitā
GR13saulahau:69: tathā hi tvat-pādodvahana-maṇi-pīṭhasya nikaṭe % sthitā hy ete śaśvan
GR13saulahau:71: virañciḥ pañcatvaṃ vrajati harir āpnoti viratiṃ $ vināśaṃ kīnāśo bhajati
GR13saulahau:73: vi-tandrī māhendrī vitatir api saṃmīlita-dṛśā % mahā-saṃhāre +asmin
GR13saulahau:75: japo jalpaḥ śilpaṃ sa-kalam api mudrā-viracanā $ gatiḥ
GR13saulahau:77: praṇāmaḥ saṃveśaḥ sukham a-khilam ātmārpaṇa-dṛśā % saparyā-paryāyas tava bhavatu yan me vilasitam dadāne dīnebhyaḥ śriyam aniśam āśā2nu-sa-dṛśīṃ $ a-mandaṃ
GR13saulahau:79: tavā7smin mandāra-stabaka-su-bhage yātu caraṇe % nimajjan maj-jīvaḥ
GR13saulahau:81: sudhām apy āsvādya pratibhaya-jarā-mṛtyu-hariṇīṃ $ vipadyante viśve vidhi-śata-makhā3dyā divi-ṣadaḥ &
GR13saulahau:82: karālaṃ yat kṣveḍaṃ kavalitavataḥ kāla-kalanā % na śaṃbhos tan-mūlaṃ tava janani tāṭaṅka-mahimā kirīṭaṃ vairiñcaṃ parihara puraḥ kaiṭabha-bhidaḥ $ kaṭhore koṭīre skhalasi
GR13saulahau:84: praṇamreṣv eteṣu prasabham abhiyātasya bhavanaṃ % bhavasyā7bhyutthāne tava
GR13saulahau:86: catuḥ-ṣaṣṭyā tantraiḥ sa-kalam abhisaṃdhāya bhuvanaṃ $ sthitas
GR13saulahau:88: punas tvan-nirbandhād a-khila-puruṣārthai1ka-ghaṭanā- % sva-tantraṃ te tantraṃ kṣiti-talam avātītarad idam // Saul_31 //
GR13saulahau:89: śivaḥ śaktiḥ kāmaḥ kṣitir atha raviḥ śīta-kiraṇaḥ $ smaro haṃsaḥ śakras
GR13saulahau:91: amī hṛl-lekhābhis tisṛbhir avasāneṣu ghaṭitā % bhajante varṇās te tava janani nāmāvayavatām smaraṃ yoniṃ lakṣmīṃ tritayam idam ādau tava manor $ nidhāyaike nitye nir-avadhi-mahā-bhoga-rasikāḥ
GR13saulahau:92: japanti tvāṃ cintā-maṇi-guna-nibaddhākṣa-valayāḥ % śivāgnau juhvantaḥ surabhi-ghṛta-dhārā3huti-śataiḥ śarīraṃ tvaṃ śaṃbhoḥ śaśi-mihira-vakṣo-ruha-yugaṃ $ tavā8tmānaṃ manye bhagavati bhavā3tmānam an-agham &
GR13saulahau:93: ataḥ śeṣaḥ śeṣī9ty ayam ubhaya-sādhāraṇatayā % sthitaḥ saṃbandho vāṃ
GR13saulahau:94: manas tvaṃ vyoma tvaṃ marud asi marut-sārathir asi $ tvam āpas tvaṃ bhūmis tvayi pariṇatāyāṃ na hi param &
GR13saulahau:95: tvam eva svā3tmānaṃ pariṇamayituṃ viśva-vapuṣā % cid-ānandā3kāraṃ
GR13saulahau:99: yam ārādhyan bhaktyā ravi-śaśi-śucīnām a-viṣaye % nir-āloke loko nivasati hi bhā-loka-bhavane viśuddhau te śuddha-sphaṭika-viśadaṃ vyoma-janakaṃ $ śivaṃ seve devīm api
GR13saulahau:103: samunmīlat-saṃvit-kamala-makarandai1ka-rasikaṃ $ bhaje haṃsa-dvaṃdvaṃ kim api mahatāṃ mānasa-caram
GR13saulahau:104: yad-ālāpād aṣṭā-daśa-guṇita-vidyā-pariṇatir % yad ādatte doṣād guṇam
GR13saulahau:106: tava svādhiṣṭhāne huta-vaham adhiṣṭhāya nirataṃ $ tam īḍe saṃvartaṃ janani mahatīṃ tāṃ ca samayām &
GR13saulahau:107: yad-āloke lokān dahati mahati krodha-kalile % dayā4rdrā dṛṣṭis te śiśiram
GR13saulahau:110: tava śyāmaṃ meghaṃ kam api maṇi-pūrai1ka-śaraṇaṃ % niṣeve varṣantaṃ hara-mihira-taptaṃ tri-bhuvanam // Saul_40 //
GR13saulahau:111: tavā8dhāre mūle saha samayayā lāsya-parayā $ navā3tmānaṃ vande
GR13saulahau:113: ubhābhyām etābhyām ubhaya-vidhim uddiśya dayayā % sa-nāthābhyāṃ jajñe
GR13saulahau:115: gatair māṇikyatvaṃ gagana-maṇibhiḥ sāndra-ghaṭitaṃ $ kirīṭaṃ te haimaṃ
GR13saulahau:117: sa nīḍeyac-chāyā-cchuraṇa-śabalaṃ candra-śakalaṃ % dhanuḥ śaunāsīraṃ kim
GR13saulahau:119: dhunotu dhvāntaṃ nas tulita-dalite1ndīvara-vanaṃ $ ghana-snigdhaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ
GR13saulahau:121: yadīyaṃ saurabhyaṃ saha-jam upalabdhuṃ su-manaso % vasanty asmin manye
GR13saulahau:127: arālaiḥ svābhāvyād ali-kalabha-sa-śrībhir alakaiḥ $ parītaṃ te vaktraṃ
GR13saulahau:131: lalāṭaṃ lāvaṇya-dyuti-vi-malam ābhāti tava yad $ dvitīyaṃ tan manye
GR13saulahau:133: viparyāsa-nyāsād ubhayam api saṃbhūya ca mithaḥ % sudhā-lepa-syūtiḥ
GR13saulahau:135: bhruvau bhugne kiṃ-cid bhuvana-bhaya-bhaṅga-vyasanini $ tvadīye netrābhyāṃ madhu-kara-rucibhyāṃ dhṛta-guṇe &
GR13saulahau:136: dhanur manye savye1tara-kara-gṛhītaṃ rati-pateḥ % prakoṣṭhe muṣṭau ca
GR13saulahau:138: ahaḥ sūte savyaṃ tava nayanam arkā3tmakatayā $ tri-yāmāṃ vāmaṃ te sṛjati
GR13saulahau:140: tṛtīyā te dṛṣtir dara-dalita-hemāmbu-ja-ruciḥ % samādhatte saṃdhyāṃ divasa-niśayor antara-carīm viśālā kalyāṇī sphuṭa-rucir a-yodhyā kuvalayaiḥ $ kṛpā-dhārā-dhārā kim api madhurā bhogavatikā
GR13saulahau:147: śive śṛṅgārā3rdrā tad-itara-mukhe kutsana-parā $ sa-roṣā gaṅgāyāṃ
GR13saulahau:149: harāhibhyo bhītā sarasi-ruha-saubhāgya-jayinī % sakhīṣu smerā te mayi janani dṛṣṭiḥ sa-karuṇā gate karṇābhyarṇaṃ garuta iva pakṣmāṇi dadhatī $ purāṃ bhettuś citta-praśama-rasa-vidrāvaṇa-phale
GR13saulahau:154: punaḥ sraṣṭuṃ devān druhiṇa-hari-rudrān uparatān % rajaḥ sattvaṃ bibhrat
GR13saulahau:155: tama iti guṇānāṃ trayam iva // Saul_53 //
GR13saulahau:158: nadaḥ śoṇo gaṅgā tapana-tanaye9ti dhruvam amuṃ % trayāṇāṃ tīrthānām upanayasi saṃbhedam an-aghe // Saul_54 //
GR13saulahau:161: iyaṃ ca śrīr baddha-cchada-puṭa-kapāṭaṃ kuvalayam % jahāti pratyūṣe niśi
GR13saulahau:163: nimeṣonmeṣābhyāṃ pralayam udayaṃ yāti jagatī $ tave7ty āhuḥ santo dharaṇi-dhara-rājanya-tanaye
GR13saulahau:164: tvad-unmeṣāj jātaṃ jagad idam a-śeṣaṃ pralayataḥ % paritrātuṃ śaṅke parihṛta-nimeṣās tava dṛśaḥ // Saul_56 //
GR13saulahau:165: dṛśā drāghīyasyā dara-dalita-nīlotpala-rucā $ davīyāṃsaṃ dīnaṃ snapaya
GR13saulahau:167: anenā7yaṃ dhanyo bhavati na ca te hānir iyatā % vane vā harmye vā
GR13saulahau:169: arālaṃ te pālī-yugalam a-ga-rājanya-tanaye $ na keṣām ādhatte
GR13saulahau:171: tiraś-cīno yatra śravaṇa-patham ullaṅghya vilasan % apāṅga-vyāsaṅgo diśati
GR13saulahau:173: sphurad-gaṇḍā3bhoga-pratiphalita-tāṭaṅka-yugalaṃ $ catuś-cakraṃ manye tava mukham idaṃ manmatha-ratham &
GR13saulahau:174: yam āruhya druhyaty avani-ratham arke1ndu-caraṇaṃ % mahā-vīro māraḥ
GR13saulahau:176: sarasvatyāḥ sū1ktīr a-mṛta-laharī-kauśala-harīḥ $ pibantyāḥ śarvāṇi śravaṇa-culukābhyām a-viratam &
GR13saulahau:177: camat-kāra-ślāghā-calita-śirasaḥ kuṇḍala-gaṇo % jhaṇat-kārais tāraiḥ prativacanam ācaṣṭae iva te // Saul_60 //
GR13saulahau:178: asau nāsā-vaṃśas tuhina-giri-vaṃśa-dhvaja-paṭi $ tvadīyo nedīyaḥ phalatu
GR13saulahau:180: vahann antar muktāḥ śiśiratara-niśvāsa-ghaṭitāḥ % samṛddhyā yas tāsāṃ
GR13saulahau:182: prakṛtyā raktāyās tava su-dati danta-cchada-ruceḥ $ pravakṣye sādṛśyaṃ janayatu phalaṃ vi-druma-latā &
GR13saulahau:183: na bimbaṃ tad-bimba-pratiphalana-lābhād aruṇitaṃ % tulām adhyāroḍhuṃ katham iva vilajjeta kalayā // Saul_62 //
GR13saulahau:184: smita-jyotsnā-jālaṃ tava vadana-candrasya pibatāṃ $ cakorāṇām āsīd ati-rasatayā cañcu-jaḍimā
GR13saulahau:185: atas te śītāṃśor a-mṛta-laharīm amla-rucayaḥ % pibanti sva-cchandaṃ
GR13saulahau:187: a-viśrāntaṃ patyur guṇa-gaṇa-kathā4mreḍana-japā $ japā-puṣpa-cchāyā tava janani jihvā jayati sā &
GR13saulahau:188: yad-agrā3sīnāyāḥ sphaṭika-dṛṣad-accha-cchavimayī % sarasvatyā mūrtiḥ pariṇamati māṇikya-vapuṣā raṇe jitvā daityān apahṛta-śiras-traiḥ kavacibhir $ nivṛttaiś
GR13saulahau:192: vipañcyā gāyantī vividham avadānaṃ paśu-pates $ tvayā0rabdhe vaktuṃ
GR13saulahau:194: tvadīyair mādhuryair apalapita-tantrī-kala-ravāṃ % nijāṃ vīṇāṃ vāṇī
GR13saulahau:196: karāgreṇa spaṣṭaṃ tuhina-giriṇā vatsalatayā $ girī3śeno7dastaṃ muhur
GR13saulahau:197: kara-grāhyaṃ śaṃbhor mukha-mukura-vṛntaṃ giri-sute % kathaṃ-kāraṃ brūmas tava cibukam aupamya-rahitam bhujā3śleṣān nityaṃ pura-damayituḥ kaṇṭakavatī $ tava grīvā dhatte
GR13saulahau:203: virājante nānā-vidha-madhura-rāgā3kara-bhuvāṃ % trayāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ sthiti-niyama-sīmāna iva te // Saul_69 //
GR13saulahau:204: mṛṇālī-mṛdvīnāṃ tava bhuja-latānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ $ caturbhiḥ saundaryaṃ sarasi-ja-bhavaḥ stauti vadanaiḥ &
GR13saulahau:205: nakhebhyaḥ saṃtrasyan prathama-mathanād andhaka-ripoś % caturṇāṃ śīrṣāṇāṃ samam a-bhaya-hastārpaṇa-dhiyā nakhānām uddyotair nava-nalina-rāgaṃ vihasatāṃ $ karāṇāṃ te kāntiṃ kathaya kathayāmaḥ katham ume &
GR13saulahau:206: kayā cid vā sāmyaṃ bhajatu kalayā hanta kamalaṃ % yadi
GR13saulahau:207: samaṃ devi skanda-dvi-pa-vadana-pītaṃ stana-yugaṃ $ tave7daṃ naḥ khedaṃ haratu satataṃ prasnuta-mukham &
GR13saulahau:208: yad ālokyā8śaṅkā3kulita-hṛdayo hāsa-janakaḥ % sva-kumbhau herambaḥ parimṛśati hastena jhaṭiti amū te vakṣo-jāv a-mṛta-rasa-māṇikya-kutupau $ na saṃdeha-spando
GR13saulahau:210: pibantau tau yasmād a-vidita-vadhū-saṃgama-rasau % kumārāv adyā7pi
GR13saulahau:216: tava stanyaṃ manye dharaṇi-dhara-kanye hṛdayataḥ $ payaḥ-pārāvāraḥ
GR13saulahau:218: dayāvatyā dattaṃ draviḍa-śiśur āsvādya tava yat % kavīnāṃ prauḍhānām ajani
GR13saulahau:220: hara-krodha-jvālāvalibhir avalīḍhena vapuṣā $ gabhīre te nābhī-sarasi
GR13saulahau:222: samuttasthau tasmād a-cala-tanaye dhūma-latikā % janas tāṃ jānīte janani tava romāvalir iti yad etat kālindī-tanutara-taraṅgā3kṛti śive $ kṛśe madhye kiṃ cij janani tava tad bhāti su-dhiyām &
GR13saulahau:223: vimardād anyo-anyaṃ kuca-kalaśayor antara-gataṃ % tanū-bhūtaṃ vyoma praviśad iva nābhī-kuhariṇīm sthiro gaṅgā4vartaḥ stana-mukula-romā3vali-latā- $ kalā4vālaṃ kuṇḍaṃ
GR13saulahau:225: rater līlā2gāraṃ kim api tava nābhī9ti giri-je % bila-dvāraṃ siddher
GR13saulahau:227: nisarga-kṣīṇasya stana-taṭa-bhareṇa klama-juṣo $ naman-mūrter nābhau baliṣu śanakais truṭyatae iva &
GR13saulahau:228: ciraṃ te madhyasya truṭita-taṭinī-tīra-taruṇā % samāvasthā-sthemno bhavatu kuśalaṃ śaila-tanaye kucau sadyaḥ svidyat-taṭa-ghaṭita-kūrpāsa-bhidurau $ kaṣantau dor-mūle
GR13saulahau:230: tava trātuṃ bhaṅgād alam iti vilagnaṃ tanu-bhuvā % tridhā naddhaṃ devi
GR13saulahau:232: gurutvaṃ vistāraṃ kṣiti-dhara-patiḥ pārvati nijān $ nitambād ācchidya tvayi haraṇa-rūpeṇa nidadhe &
GR13saulahau:233: atas te vistīrṇo gurur ayam a-śeṣāṃ vasumatīṃ % nitamba-prāg-bhāraḥ
GR13saulahau:235: karī1ndrāṇāṃ śuṇḍāḥ kanaka-kadalī-kāṇḍa-paṭalīm $ ubhābhyām ūrubhyām ubhayam api nirjitya bhavatī &
GR13saulahau:236: su-vṛttābhyāṃ patyuḥ praṇati-kaṭhinābhyāṃ giri-sute % vijigye jānubhyāṃ vibudha-kari-kumbha-dvayam api // Saul_82 //
GR13saulahau:237: parājetuṃ rudraṃ- dvi-guṇa-śara-garbhau giri-sute $ niṣaṅgau jaṅghe te
GR13saulahau:240: śrutīnāṃ mūrdhāno dadhati tava yau śekharatayā $ mamā7py etau mātaḥ śirasi
GR13saulahau:242: yayoḥ pādyaṃ pāthaḥ paśu-pati-jaṭā-jūṭa-taṭinī % yayor lākṣā-lakṣmīr
GR13saulahau:244: namo-vākaṃ brūmo nayana-ramaṇīyāya padayos $ tavā7smai dvandvāya
GR13saulahau:245: asūyaty aty-antaṃ yad abhihananāya spṛhayate % paśūnām īśānaḥ pramada-vana-kaṅkeli-tarave mṛṣā kṛtvā gotra-skhalanam atha vailakṣya-namitaṃ $ lalāṭe bhartāraṃ caraṇa-kamale tāḍayati te &
GR13saulahau:248: himānī-hantavyaṃ hima-giri-taṭā3krānti-caturau $ niśāyāṃ nidrāṇāṃ niśi ca
GR13saulahau:250: paraṃ lakṣmī-pātraṃ śriyam atisṛjantau samayināṃ % saro-jaṃ tvat-pādau
GR13saulahau:251: janani jayataś citram iha kim // Saul_87 //
GR13saulahau:252: padaṃ te kāntīnāṃ pra-padam a-padaṃ devi vipadāṃ $ kathaṃ nītaṃ sadbhiḥ
GR13saulahau:254: kathaṃ vā bāhubhyām upayamana-kāle pura-bhidā % yad ādāya nyastaṃ dṛṣadi dayamānena manasā nakhair nāka-strīṇāṃ kara-kamala-saṃkoca-śaśibhis $ tarūṇāṃ divyānāṃ hasata iva te caṇḍi caraṇau &
GR13saulahau:255: phalāni sva-sthebhyaḥ kisalaya-karāgreṇa dadatāṃ % daridrebhyo bhadrāṃ śriyam a-niśam ahnāya dadatau // Saul_89 //
GR13saulahau:256: kadā kāle mātaḥ kathaya kalitālaktaka-rasaṃ $ pibeyaṃ vidyā2rthī tava
GR13saulahau:258: prakṛtyā mūkānām api ca kavitā-kāraṇatayā % yad ādhatte vāṇī-mukha-kamala-tāmbūla-rasatām pada-nyāsa-krīḍā-paricayam ivā8rabdhu-manasaś $ carantas te khelaṃ
GR13saulahau:262: arālā keśeṣu prakṛti-saralā manda-hasite $ śirīṣā3bhā citte dṛṣad iva
GR13saulahau:264: bhṛśaṃ tanvī madhye pṛthur urasi-jā3roha-viṣaye % jagat trātuṃ śaṃbhor
GR13saulahau:265: jayati karuṇā kā cid aruṇā // Saul_92 //
GR13saulahau:266: purārāter antaḥ-puram asi tatas tvac-caraṇayoḥ $ saparyā-maryādā
GR13saulahau:268: tathā hy ete nītāḥ śata-makha-mukhāḥ siddhim a-tulāṃ % tava
GR13saulahau:272: tvadīyānāṃ bhāsāṃ pratiphalana-lābhāruṇatayā % śarīrī śṛṅgāro rasa iva dṛśāṃ dogdhi kutukam kalaṅkaḥ kastūrī rajani-kara-bimbaṃ jalamayaṃ $ kalābhiḥ karpūrair marakata-karaṇḍaṃ nibiḍitam
GR13saulahau:273: atas tvad-bhogena prati-dinam idaṃ rikta-kuharaṃ % vidhir bhūyo-bhūyo
GR13saulahau:275: sva-dehodbhūtābhir ghṛṇibhir aṇimā4dyābhir abhito $ niṣevye nitye tvām
GR13saulahau:277: kim āścaryaṃ tasya tri-nayan-samṛddhiṃ tṛṇayato % mahā-saṃvartāgnir
GR13saulahau:279: kalatraṃ vaidhātraṃ kati-kati bhajante na kavayaḥ $ śriyo devyāḥ ko vā na bhavati patiḥ kair api dhanaiḥ &
GR13saulahau:280: mahā-devaṃ hitvā tava sati satīnām a-carame % kucābhyām āsaṅgaḥ kuravaka-taror apy a-su-labhaḥ girām āhur devīṃ druhiṇa-gṛhiṇīm āgama-vido $ hareḥ patnīṃ padmāṃ
GR13saulahau:282: turīyā kā9pi tvaṃ dur-adhigama-niḥ-sīma-mahimā % mahā-māye viśvaṃ bhramayasi para-brahma-mahiṣi sarasvatyā lakṣmyā vidhi-hari-sa-patno viharate $ rateḥ pātivratyaṃ śithilayati ramyeṇa vapuṣā &
GR13saulahau:287: svakīyair ambhobhiḥ salila-nidhi-sauhitya-karaṇaṃ % tvadīyābhir vāgbhis tava janani vācāṃ stutir iyam // Saul_100 //
GR13saulahau:290: dadhāti tvad-vaktraṃ pratiphalitam a-śrānti-vikacaṃ % nir-ātaṅkaṃ candrān
GR13saulahau:292: samudbhūta-sthūla-stana-bharam uraś cāru hasitaṃ $ kaṭākṣe kandarpaḥ kusumita-kadamba-dyuti-vapuḥ
GR13saulahau:293: harasya tvad-bhrāntiṃ manasi janayām āsa madano % bhavatyā ye bhaktāḥ
GR13saulahau:296: niyatyā nirmukte nikhila-nigamānta-stuti-pade % nir-ātaṅke nitye nigamaya mamā7pi stutim imām // Saul_103 //
